mapper.insert: insert into tbl_schedule(sdno, startdate,enddate,subject,color,place,joinEmp,content,fk_scno,fk_bcno,fk_employeeid) values(sdnoSeq.nextval, to_date(#{startdate},'yyyyMMddhh24miss'), to_date(#{enddate}, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss'), #{subject}, #{color}, #{place}, #{joinEmp}, #{content}, #{fk_scno},#{fk_bcno}, #{fk_employeeid})
mapper.select: select sdno, startdate,enddate,subject,color,place,joinEmp,content,fk_scno,fk_employeeid from tbl_schedule where fk_employeeid=#{fk_employeeid} or fk_bcno=#{fk_bcno} order by sdno desc
